title: Review: Cadex Max 40 Carbon Wheels Are Aero, Light, & Very Lively
content:
It faces new challengers, but the Cadex Max 40 continues to be the best choice when you want an explosive ride feel.

Read the full article at Review: Cadex Max 40 Carbon Wheels Are Aero, Light, & Very Lively on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
